column2:
"I've been hearing about your efforts from all
corners lately. That's just great, really great."

"But don't get cocky now. That's when you're the
most vulnerable, if you ask me."

"Tell you what. I'll give you a chance to
look back and go over the basics."

"A realistic assessment of your abilities
is key to keeping your cocky side at bay!"

"That's why I'm taking you on the mission
\"Tunnels Mech.\" This is a great
chance to really test your capabilities."
